price: 42. Of (als) Wij jouw laten zien datgene waarmee Wij hen zullen bestraffen. Waarlijk, wij hebben de macht over hen.
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
